gui.element
Class Box

java.lang.Object
  gui.element.Box

public class Box
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores a reference of all the cells contained within a 3x3 area.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Alvin Moradi with contributions from the "AWESOME SAUCE" team.
